Identity.Name: Swazlid Swarm
Identity.Basic_Description: assorted small lizards ranging from 6 inches to 3 feet in size

Abilities.Name: Swarm
Abilities.Ability: All Swarzlid Swarm tokens take their turn at the same time. When multiple Swazlid Swarm attack the same unit combine their attack and skill into a single attack. (If 3 Swazlid Swarm attack a unit, they attack as one unit with 3-3 attack.
